snippet.title: Professor Kageyama's Maths Training/Personal Trainer Math Trailer
snippet.description:
Click (more) for useful info.

Known in America as Personal Trainer: Math

Aspect ratio can be corrected by button to right of progress bar.

Information:
http://www.nintendo.co.uk/NOE/en_GB/games/nds/professor_kageyamas_maths_training_6819.html

But to summarise.

Full game title is Professor Kageyama's Maths Training: The Hundred Cell Calculation Method.

Europe gets this title on the 8th February 2008.

I imagine America will have it as soon as someone has thought of a simpler and catchier name. :P

It sounds like the maths bit of brain training except it gets harder as you get better. All I can hope is the number recognition is improved from that.
